languages.text: "Вы разрушили мой дом, убили Теобальда... И все ради этого? Да он обманет вас так же, как много лет обманывал моих людей! Я вижу это — болотный туман застилает ваш взор, но глубоко в душе теплится золотое сияние истины. Вы знаете, что я говорю правду".

traits.locale_text: "Вы разрушили мой дом, убили Теобальда... И все ради этого? Да он обманет вас так же, как много лет обманывал моих людей! Я вижу это — болотный туман застилает ваш взор, но глубоко в душе теплится золотое сияние истины. Вы знаете, что я говорю правду".

languages.text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."
languages.original_text: "Вы разрушили мой дом, убили Теобальда... И все ради этого? Да он обманет вас так же, как много лет обманывал моих людей! Я вижу это — болотный туман застилает ваш взор, но глубоко в душе теплится золотое сияние истины. Вы знаете, что я говорю правду".

traits.locale_text: "You wrecked my home and killed Theobald... For this? He is going to deceive you just like he was deceiving my people for years! I can see it, the mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart the golden light of the truth is shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

"You wrecked my home and killed Theobald... For this? He is going to deceive you just like he was deceiving my people for years! I can see it, the mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart the golden light of the truth is shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

"You ruined my home and killed Theobald... For this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of the truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

"You ruined my home and killed Theobald... For this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of the truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

"You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

"You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

languages.text: "Ihr habt meine Heimat zerstört und Theobald getötet ... Dafür? Er wird Euch täuschen, genau wie er mein Volk all die Jahre lang getäuscht hat! Der moosartige Nebel trübt Eure Sicht, doch tief in Eurem Herzen sehe ich das goldene Licht der Wahrheit schimmern. Ihr wisst, dass ich Euch nicht anlüge."
languages.original_text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt meine Heimat zerstört und Theobald getötet ... Dafür? Er wird Euch täuschen, genau wie er mein Volk all die Jahre lang getäuscht hat! Der moosartige Nebel trübt Eure Sicht, doch tief in Eurem Herzen sehe ich das goldene Licht der Wahrheit schimmern. Ihr wisst, dass ich Euch nicht anlüge."

languages.text: « Vous avez saccagé ma demeure et tué Théobald... Pour ça ? Il vous trompera comme il a trompé mes gens pendant toutes ces années ! Une brume épaisse vous aveugle, mais je perçois au fond de votre cœur la lumière dorée de la vérité. Vous savez que je ne vous mens pas. »
languages.original_text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez saccagé ma demeure et tué Théobald... Pour ça ? Il vous trompera comme il a trompé mes gens pendant toutes ces années ! Une brume épaisse vous aveugle, mais je perçois au fond de votre cœur la lumière dorée de la vérité. Vous savez que je ne vous mens pas. »

languages.text: “你毁了我的家园，杀了西奥巴德……莫非只是出于这个理由吗？他会欺骗你，正如他这么多年来一直在欺骗我的人民！苔藓般的迷雾遮住了你的双眼，但在你内心深处，我看到了真相的金色光芒在闪耀。你很清楚，我并没有骗你。”
languages.original_text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

traits.locale_text: “你毁了我的家园，杀了西奥巴德……莫非只是出于这个理由吗？他会欺骗你，正如他这么多年来一直在欺骗我的人民！苔藓般的迷雾遮住了你的双眼，但在你内心深处，我看到了真相的金色光芒在闪耀。你很清楚，我并没有骗你。”

languages.text: 「こんなことのためにあたくしの家を壊して、シオボールドの命を奪ったのですか…？あの人は、ずっと我が民を騙してきたように、あなたをも騙すでしょう！濃い霧があなたの目を曇らせているけど、その心の奥底に真実の金色の光が輝いているのが見えます。あたくしが嘘を言っていない事はお分かりでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私の家を壊して、テオバルドの命を奪った…こんなことのために？あの人は、ずっと我が民にしてきたように、あなたを騙すのです！濃い霧があなたの目を曇らせているけど、その心の奥底に真実の金色の光が輝いています。私が嘘を言っていない事はお分かりでしょう」
「こんなことのためにあたくしの家を壊して、シオボールドの命を奪ったのですか…？あの人は、ずっと我が民を騙してきたように、あなたをも騙すでしょう！濃い霧があなたの目を曇らせているけど、その心の奥底に真実の金色の光が輝いているのが見えます。あたくしが嘘を言っていない事はお分かりでしょう」

languages.text: «Ha arruinado mi hogar y matado a Theobald... ¿Por esto? ¡Le engañará igual que ha engañado a mi gente durante todos estos años! La niebla musgosa nubla sus ojos, pero en lo más hondo de su corazón veo la luz dorada de la verdad abrirse paso. Sabe que no le miento».
languages.original_text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

traits.locale_text: «Ha arruinado mi hogar y matado a Theobald... ¿Por esto? ¡Le engañará igual que ha engañado a mi gente durante todos estos años! La niebla musgosa nubla sus ojos, pero en lo más hondo de su corazón veo la luz dorada de la verdad abrirse paso. Sabe que no le miento».

languages.text: "Yuvamı yıkıp Theobald'ı öldürmen... Bunun için miydi? Senelerdir halkımı kandırdığı gibi seni de kandıracak! Gözlerini yosunlu pus bürümüş ama kalbinin derinlerindeki altın hakikat ışığını görebiliyorum. Yalan söylemediğimi sen de biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: "You ruined my home and killed Theobald... for this? He will deceive you just like he's been deceiving my people for all these years! The mossy fog is clouding your eyes, but deep in your heart I can see the golden light of truth shining through. You know I am not lying to you."

traits.locale_text: "Yuvamı yıkıp Theobald'ı öldürmen... Bunun için miydi? Senelerdir halkımı kandırdığı gibi seni de kandıracak! Gözlerini yosunlu pus bürümüş ama kalbinin derinlerindeki altın hakikat ışığını görebiliyorum. Yalan söylemediğimi sen de biliyorsun."
